text: Arthata paigambara jasale timro samu allahaka spasta ayataharu padhera suna'umchan, taki jasale imana lya'umchan ra asala karma gardachan uniharula'i amdhyarobata nikali ujyalotira lya'os ra juna vyaktile allahamathi imana lya'umcha ra asala karma garnecha uniharula'i allahale svargaka yasta bagaharuma pravista garnecha, jasamuni naharaharu bagirakheka chan, sadhaim tyasama rahanechan. Nihsandeha allahale uniharuko nimti uttama jivika pradana garirakheko cha
